jd_information.description: We are hiring for the below mentioned position for a Travel Company: Designation: B2B Sales Executive_Visa CTC: Rs 2.5 LPA to 3.00 LPA Location: MumbaiRequired Skills-Good Communication skillsFreshers with IATA certification can apply.Candidates with experience in Sales in Travel industry preferred.Job responsibilities:· Field Sales· Generate VISA business through travel agents.In case interested kindly contact on +91-9759214475or share your CV on assuredjob12@gmail.com
